catamaranDestinations.title: Sailing Destinations

catamaranIntro.title: Welcome Aboard
catamaranIntro.welcome: Welcome to our luxury catamaran experience
catamaranIntro.text: Discover the beauty of sailing with our premium fleet.
catamaranIntro.highlights: Experience comfort, safety, and adventure on the water.

catamaranService.title: Our Services
catamaranService.description: Professional charter services with experienced crew and modern equipment.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Our Charter Service?

premiumFleet.title: Premium Fleet
premiumFleet.description: Our modern equipped catamarans offer comfort and safety for an unforgettable sailing experience on the IJsselmeer.

experiencedCrew.title: Experienced Crew
experiencedCrew.description: Our professional skippers have extensive knowledge of the sailing area and ensure a safe and enjoyable trip.

allInclusive.title: All Inclusive
allInclusive.description: Fuel, insurance, safety equipment and professional guidance - everything is included in our transparent prices.

whyChoose.conclusion: Whether you choose a relaxing half day on the water or an extensive full day charter with lunch, we ensure a perfect sailing experience. Contact us for availability and to reserve your charter.

cta.title: Ready to Book Your Charter?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today to plan your perfect sailing adventure on the IJsselmeer

contact.heroSubtitle: We're here to help with your booking
contact.formSubtitle: We'll get back to you within 24 hours
contact.thankYouMessage: Thank you! We received your message.
contact.howItWorksSubtitle: Simple steps to book your charter
contact.step1Description: Select from our premium catamaran fleet
contact.step2Description: Choose your preferred sailing date and time
contact.step3Description: Complete your reservation and set sail

transportInfo.title: Getting Here
transportInfo.subtitle: Transportation information
transportInfo.parkingInfo: Free parking available at the marina
transportInfo.contactUsForGroupTransport: Contact us for group transport arrangements

cta.title: Ready to set sail?
cta.desc: Contact us today to book your charter.

whatToExpect.title: What to Expect?
whatToExpect.subtitle: Every charter is a unique experience on the beautiful IJsselmeer

modernCatamaran.title: Modern Catamaran
modernCatamaran.description: Our modern catamarans are equipped with all comfort and safety features. Spacious decks, comfortable seating and a covered salon ensure a pleasant experience in any weather.

safetyFirst.title: Safety First
safetyFirst.description: Safety is our top priority. All guests receive life jackets, we have extensive safety equipment on board and our experienced skippers ensure safe sailing.

uniqueRoutes.title: Unique Routes
uniqueRoutes.description: Discover the most beautiful spots of the IJsselmeer. From historic harbor towns to quiet bays - every route offers spectacular views and interesting stories.

perfectForEveryOccasion.title: Perfect For Every Occasion
perfectForEveryOccasion.description: Whether you're organizing a company outing, celebrating a birthday, planning a romantic day, or just want to enjoy sailing with friends and family - our charters provide the perfect setting for unforgettable moments on the water.

ijsselmeerInfo.title: The Beautiful IJsselmeer
ijsselmeerInfo.description: The IJsselmeer is one of the most beautiful sailing areas in the Netherlands. This large inland sea offers excellent sailing conditions with sufficient wind and space, while the sheltered location ensures safe sailing conditions.

features.sheltered: Sheltered inland water - safe for all levels

enkhuizen.description: Historic port city with beautiful monuments

urk.description: Former island with authentic fishing culture

volendam.description: Colorful fishing village with traditional costumes

weather.heroSubtitle: Real-time weather data for the IJsselmeer sailing area
weather.introText: Check live weather conditions including rain radar and wind forecasts for the IJsselmeer. Our weather tools help you plan the perfect catamaran charter experience.
weather.radarDesc: Live precipitation radar showing rain intensity and movement across the Netherlands
weather.liveRainDesc: Real-time weather monitoring for safe sailing
weather.checkBeforeSailing: Always check current weather conditions before departing for your sailing adventure
weather.windDesc: Detailed wind forecasts, direction, and speed for optimal sailing conditions
weather.tip1: Check wind conditions before departure - ideal sailing winds are 10-20 knots
weather.tip2: Monitor rain radar to avoid heavy precipitation during your trip
weather.tip3: Early morning and late afternoon often offer the most stable conditions
weather.tip4: Our experienced crew can help interpret weather conditions for your safety
weather.contactText: Our experienced crew can help you interpret weather conditions and plan the best sailing experience.
